# Please cite arXiv:2005.07200
# The visible decay probability (as defined in the text) as a function of final neutrino energy (GeV) for various different initial spectral indices
# The first row is the parameters:
#   Initial flavor (nu_e = 0, nu_mu = 1, nu_tau = 2)
#   Final flavor (nu_e = 0, nu_mu = 1, nu_tau = 2)
#   g
#   z
#   m_1 (eV)
#   Number of spectral indices
#   Various gamma values
# The columns are:
#   E_f (GeV)
#   Probability in the SM
#   Visible decay probability with the various gamma values rescaled by (1+z)^gamma for convenience
